title: 1  Future of Finance with a Comprehensive B2B Design System, 2  AI-Powered Automation for Financial Operations, 3  Data Visualization Platform for Finance Companies
description:
Title: Future of Finance with a Comprehensive B2B Design System

Description:  Contribute to a cutting-edge design system for B2B clients in finance apps. Focus on creating productivity-driven interfaces that simplify complex financial operations while evolving with emerging interface technologies.

Skill sets: Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles with a portfolio that showcases your design work (academic projects, internships, etc.).

Proficiency in design tools such as Figma

A passion for creating products that solve user problems and are easy to use.

Good communication skills and the ability to present design ideas clearly.

Ability to work in a team environment and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Familiarity with wireframing, prototyping, and design processes is a plus.

Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced, evolving environment.

Traits expectation: Adaptability and curiosity

Expected learning: Participate in developing a scalable design system for consistent, user-centered experiences.

Design productivity-focused, intuitive workflows for finance professionals.

Specific courses required for project execution: Circuit branch students with interest in product design

Title: AI-Powered Automation for Financial Operations

Description:  Leverage AI to simplify complex financial operations, providing real-time user guidance and automating tasks that require high-level diligence, accuracy, and trust. The idea is to reduce manual effort while enhancing operational efficiency for finance professionals

Skill sets: Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles with a portfolio that showcases your design work (academic projects, internships, etc.).

Proficiency in design tools such as Figma

A passion for creating products that solve user problems and are easy to use.

Good communication skills and the ability to present design ideas clearly.

Ability to work in a team environment and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Familiarity with wireframing, prototyping, and design processes is a plus.

Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced, evolving environment.

Traits expectation: Adaptability and curiosity

Expected learning: Minimizing human errors by designing workflows that automate critical financial tasks to enhance precision, speed, and productivity.

Design intuitive interfaces that educate users with AI-guided steps for complex processes.

Help make AI systems transparent by letting people understand how they work and giving them the power to change decisions if necessary. This will build trust."

 

Specific courses required for project execution: Circuit branch students with interest in product design

Title: Data Visualization Platform for Finance Companies

Description: Develop a data visualization platform that empowers finance companies to analyse complex data sets in real time. Make it easy for people to understand and use financial data by showing it in a clear and interactive way.

Skill sets: Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles with a portfolio that showcases your design work (academic projects, internships, etc.).

Proficiency in design tools such as Figma

A passion for creating products that solve user problems and are easy to use.

Good communication skills and the ability to present design ideas clearly.

Ability to work in a team environment and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Familiarity with wireframing, prototyping, and design processes is a plus.

Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced, evolving environment.

Traits expectation: Adaptability and curiosity

Expected learning:

Design an interactive platform with customizable charts, graphs, and dashboards tailored to various financial metrics, allowing users to meet their analytical needs.

Help in building solutions that enable in-depth data analysis by connecting with your financial databases.

Specific courses required for project execution: Circuit branch students with interest in product design

projectFacility.others: Accommodation for 7 days and flight tickets
